content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam engine at position(0, 0)
- Boiler at position(0, 1)
- Offshore pump at position(0, 2)

### Copper plate mine at position(-28.5, -61.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position(-28.5, -61.5) and a furnace at position(-28.5, -60.5)

### Iron plate mine at position(-15.5, -50.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position(-15.5, -50.5) and a furnace at position(-15.5, -49.5)

### Copper cable factory at position(2, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine at position(2, 0) and inserter at position(2, 1) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup connecting the furnace at position(2, 2) to the assembling machine at position(2, 0)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.

### Errors related to insufficient ingredients
- Check the inventory and ensure that you have the necessary ingredients before attempting to craft or place entities.
